subject: HELP DISCOUNT CODE
description_text: HI JUST SINED UP TODAY FOR NEW USER ACCOUNT AND DID NOT GET 20$ DISCOUNT PLEASE HELP THANKS

conversations.body_text: Until when does to sale end on your site. Im trying to make it before the sale ends
Hello, simply enter FFLV20 at checkout to enjoy a $20 discount. Please note that the discount applies to orders totaling $199 or more.
